revised_title: Unicellular Parasitic Algae in Corals: Their Growth, Distribution, and Impact
tldr: The author examines the parasitic algae found within corals and their impact on coral structures. They discuss the methods of entry, growth, and distribution of these unicellular organisms and their presence in both recent and fossil corals. The author also provides insights into the preservation of these algae in coral specimens and the impact of environmental factors on their growth.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Marine Biology
